coded_answer.p: DEAR MRS. HELEN RYAN
COMPETITION ORGANISER
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR THE NICE SURPRISE YOU'VE BEEN GIVEN TO ME,. I JUST CAN'T BELIEVE IT THAT I WON THE FIRST PRIZE. HERE IS THE INFORMATION YOU ASKED FOR:
. I'M AFRAID I CAN ONLY GO ONIN JULY BECAUSE DURING THAT TIMEMONTH I WILL HAVE MY HOLIDAYS FROM SCHOOLSCHOOL HOLIDAYS, SO THAT WILL BE FOR ME THE ONLY POSSIBILITYCHANCE OF TO TAKETAKING 2 WEEKS OFF.
. THE KIND OF ACCOMODATIONACCOMMODATION I PREFER IS IN A TENT BECAUSE INAT A SOMMERSUMMER CAMP I FIND IT MORE INTERESTING SLEEPING 'OUTSIDE'OUTSIDE UNDER THE SKY WHEN THE WEATHER IS NICE AND WARM.

. THERE ARE TWO ACTIVITIES I WOULD LIKE TO PRACTICEPRACTISEDO: BASKETBALL AND PAINTING. IMI'M QUITE GOOD AT PLAYING BASKETBALL BECAUSE I USED TO PLAY FOR ABOUT FIVE YEARS AT SCHOOL,. WE USED TO HAVE TRAININGSTRAINING SESSIONS TWICE A WEEK AND AT LEAST TWO GAMES ATA MONTH AGAINST ANOTHER SCHOOLSSCHOOL, WHICH WAS GREAT. PAINTING ALWAYS DID FASCINATEDFASCINATE ME, EVEN THOUGH I'M NOT SO GOOD ONAT IT, BUT MY FRIENDS THEY SAY I CAN REALLY PAINT AND THEY LOVE THE THINGS I DO,. THE TECHNIKTECHNIQUE I LIKE THE MOST IS WATERCOLORSWATERCOLOURS.
I STILL HAVE SOME QUESTIONS:
- CAN YOU PLEASE TELL ME HOW IS THE WEATHERTHE WEATHER IS THEN, SO I CAN TAKE THE PROPER CLOTHES?
- MY PARENTS AND MEI, WE ARE NOT SURE HOW MUCH MONEY DO I NEED FOR THE TWO WEEKS, CAN YOU GIVE ME A LITTLE HELP? THANK YOU VERY MUCH AND I HOPE HEARINGTO HEAR FROM YOU SOON.
YOURS SINCERELY
H. PENA.
DEAR KIM

HELLO MY GOOD FRIEND!, I'M SO GLAD TO HEAR FROM YOU AND TO KNOW THAT YOU ARE WEALTHY AND HAPPY. DO YOU REALLY WANT TO KNOW ABOUT MY EXPIERENCEEXPERIENCE HELPING AT THE POP CONCERT IN OUR TOWN?, WELL THAT'S GREAT, BECAUSE IT WAS A TERRIFIC DAY. FIRST WE STARTED VERY EARLY IN THE MORNING, BUILDING UP THE STAGE AND THE TENT WHERE THE GROUP WAS GOING TO PLAY, YOU KNOW, JUST IN CASE THE RAIN WOULD HAVE COMEIT RAINED,. BUT WE WERE VERY LUCKY AND THE WEATHER WAS SUNNY AND WARM.

THEN CAME THE GUY WHO INSTALLED THE SOUND EQUIPMENT (CABLES, BOXES, WIRES, ETC) AND IT WAS VERY INTERESTING SEEING HIM AT WORK,. EVERYTHING HAD TO BE ONIN THE RIGHT PLACE, PERFECTLY INSTALLED AND PROTECTED, TO AVOID ACCIDENTS.

AT ABOUT FIVE O'CLOCK EVERYTHING WAS READY AND THE BAND CAME INON,. THERE WERE ALREADY PLENTY OF 'FANS'FANS WAITING FOR THE CONCERT TO BEGIN, WHICH STARTED AT 7 O'CLOCK. I KNOW THE MUSICIANS FROM THE SCHOOL TIME, THAT'SWHICH IS WHY IT WAS EVEN MORE FUN TO HELP AND TO TAKE PART ONIN THIS EVENT, SPECIALLY BECAUSE I REALLY LIKE THE MUSIC THEY PLAY.

THE PEOPLECROWD WENT CRAZY DURING THE 2 HOURS2 HOUR2-HOUR CONCERT AND AT LEAST I HELPED AS WELL, SELLING CD'SCDS, - IF THEY WEREGO ON SELLING THAT MUCHMANY, THEY ARE GOING TO BE FOR SURE VERY FAMOUSVERY FAMOUS FOR SURE .....
DO YOU WANT TO KNOW SOMETHING ELSE ABOUT IT?
JUST LET ME KNOW
BEST WISHES
HERBERTO
